title: The best gaming mouse deals in Amazon's Spring Sale
description: It's click season, and Amazon's Spring Sale has some absolute bangers lined up for your next mouse upgrade. Whether you're grinding out ranked in Valorant or just need something smoother than your office-issued brick, now's the time to strike. Prices are slashed, specs are stacked, and your K/D ratio is crying out for better gear. Read more
author: Christian Wait
excerpt: Upgrade your setup with the best gaming mouse deals in the Amazon Spring Sale. From Razer to Logitech, get top performance and huge savings.
text: Score top-tier precision without paying full price. Image credit: RPS Photo Composite / ASUS It's click season, and Amazon's Spring Sale has some absolute bangers lined up for your next mouse upgrade. Whether you're grinding out ranked in Valorant or just need something smoother than your office-issued brick, now's the time to strike. Prices are slashed, specs are stacked, and your K/D ratio is crying out for better gear. Product Sensor DPI Weight Connectivity Battery Life Buttons Special Features Razer DeathAdder V3 Pro Focus Pro 30K Optical 30,000 63g HyperSpeed Wireless, Bluetooth, USB Up to 90 hrs 5 Optical Switches Gen-3, 0.2ms actuation SteelSeries Rival 3 Wireless TrueMove Air Optical 18,000 Unlisted 2.4 GHz Wireless, Bluetooth 400+ hrs 6 Dual Wireless, Mechanical Switches (60M clicks) Logitech G305 LIGHTSPEED HERO 12K 12,000 99g LIGHTSPEED Wireless 250 hrs 6 On-board memory, Lightweight design Redragon M612 Predator Optical 8,000 Unlisted Wired USB N/A 11 RGB, Rapid Fire, Macro Keys ASUS ROG Spatha X 19,000 DPI Optical 19,000 Unlisted 2.4GHz Wireless, USB-C 67 hrs (wireless), 12 hrs per 15-min charge 12 Hot Swap Sockets, Magnetic Charger, Aura RGB From ultra-lightweight esports champs to RGB-packed macro monsters, this list rounds up the best gaming mice deals available right now. We’ve got wireless warriors, wired beasts, and everything in between. Scroll down, compare specs, and grab a bargain before stock disappears faster than your patience in solo queue. If speed, precision, and feather-light feel are your priorities, the DeathAdder V3 Pro is your mouse. At just 63g, it glides like a dream and packs Razer’s Focus Pro 30K sensor for pinpoint tracking (even on glass). HyperSpeed Wireless keeps things buttery smooth, while the Gen-3 optical switches give you lightning-fast 0.2ms actuation. With up to 90 hours of battery and a tournament-tested shape, this is a top-tier choice for competitive gamers. This is your MVP for budget wireless gaming. The Rival 3 Wireless boasts a bonkers 400+ hour battery life and dual wireless modes (2.4GHz + Bluetooth), making it just as useful for gaming as it is for hopping between devices. The TrueMove Air sensor delivers solid 18,000 CPI tracking, and it’s built tough with 60M click-rated switches. At under $25, this one’s punching well above its weight. Don’t let the price fool you, this thing is a weapon. The G305’s HERO 12K sensor offers pro-level accuracy, and its LIGHTSPEED wireless connection is fast enough for esports play. The 250-hour battery life on a single AA and the ultra-portable 99g design make it ideal for gaming at home or on the go. Reliable, responsive, and now ridiculously affordable. Looking for the most buttons per dollar? The M612 is it. You get 11 programmable buttons, 5 RGB lighting modes, and an 8000 DPI optical sensor—all for the price of lunch. The ergonomic grip and dedicated rapid-fire button sweeten the deal, and Redragon’s software gives you full macro control. Perfect for MMOs, strategy games, or productivity power users who love a flashy setup. This one’s for the serious rig-builders. The Spatha X is big, bold, and ready to dominate. With 12 programmable buttons, hot-swappable switches, and a 19,000 DPI sensor, it’s a tank in mouse form. It charges via USB-C or its magnetic dock, and the dual-mode wireless keeps you connected your way. Built like a tank, lit like a rave, and tuned for MMO and MOBA glory—this is your endgame mouse.
